name: Space Duel (itch)
description:
⚠ DISCLAIMER!
This game isn't associated with Space Duel by Atari. Please don't sue me Atari, I'm not making any money with this game. At the time of making I just didn't know a game with this name already existed.

Shoot your friends with lasers in the space ship duel shooter Space Duel. Fun for two players!

WASD and Spacebar for the left player
Arrow keys and Enter for the right player

I made this game at the start of 2016, when I learned to use the Phaser game engine (phaser.io). Everything is kind of janky and the code is not clean at all. I'm hoping to make an improved version with a new title during my lifetime. Don't expect anything huge, I'm still a student and have limited time, resources and motivation.

I hope you still have fun with my little game though.

If you wanna waste time checking out my other stupid projects, here you go: dasmaennel.github.io

Cheers
- DasMaennel (Martin)
